means: 预言家，先知( prophet的名词复数 )
穆罕默德（伊斯兰教的创始人）
(<圣经>旧约>和<希伯来圣经>中的)先知书

sentence.Network_en: William Morris was one of the early prophets of socialism.
sentence.Network_cn: 威廉∙莫里斯是社会主义的早期传播者之一。

sentence.Network_en: Daniel was one of the great prophets in the Bible.
sentence.Network_cn: 丹尼尔是《圣经》中一位伟大的先知.

sentence.Network_en: I promised myself I'd defy all the prophets of doom and battle back to fitness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我发誓要打破所有的死亡预言，力争恢复健康。

PerfectNetExp.abs: on literary features of the prophets ., 试论先知书的创作特征.
Mt And many false prophets will arise and will lead many astray ., 太二四 11 且有好些假申言者要起来 , 迷惑许多人.
Is Saul also among the prophets ?, 扫罗也列在先知中么.
The words of the prophets are Written subway walls and tenement halls ., 先知者的语言 , 写在地铁的墙上 , 写在廉价公寓的大厅中.

穆斯林称这里是先知穆罕默德（Prophet Muhammad）天堂之旅的起点，而在犹太教中，这里也正是始祖亚伯拉罕（Abraham）以亲 …
and many false prophets will appear and deceive many people ., 且有好些假先知起来 , 迷惑多人.

entry.def: A prophet is a person who is believed to be chosen by God to say the things that God wants to tell people.

example.ex: ...the sacred name of the Holy Prophet of Islam.

entry.def: A prophet is someone who predicts that something will happen in the future.

example.ex: I promised myself I'd defy all the prophets of doom and battle back to fitness.
example.tran: 我发誓要打破所有的死亡预言，力争恢复健康。

means.word_mean: 1. the second of three divisions of the Hebrew Scriptures
